name: Tractor Egg
description:
Tractor Egg is a 2 - 4 player game about picking up tractor eggs with your tractor, and throwing it in between your cairns. Can be played in teams or free for all. The green egg pooper poops out a new egg every once in a while. You can pick up other players as well.

Made at the Isolation Game Jam 2016

GAME by joon @joonturbo
SFX (+ tractor & egg) by johannesgunnar @johannesgunnar
ART by Pavel Savchuk

(I didn't use any version control and managed to delete half the project right after making the build, so I can no longer make a Mac or Linux build :(, sorry)

How to play
  1. Pick your team by driving up to a Cairn. Your car will get the team color
  2. When all players are in press and hold [start] on the controller (needs min 2 teams).
  3. The goal of the game is to be the first team or player to have 5 goals. You score by dropping or throwing a tractor egg over the edge.
  4. There is no penalty for falling over the edge or getting a new tractor.
  5. (To disable the egg pooper, take the egg out of the cage in the team select menu. You'll now have a single egg that respawn.)

Controller
Accelerate / Reverse: [Right Shoulder] [Left Shoulder]
Throw: [A]
New tractor: [Y]
Help (in menu): [Back]

Keyboard
up, down, left, right, new tractor, throw
p1: ↑ ↓ ← → [return] [left shift]
p2: [W] [S] [A] [D] [Q] [E]
p3: [T] [G] [F] [H] [R] [Y]
p4: [I] [K] [J] [L] [U] [O]
HOLD SPACE TO START

❤❤❤ THE CONTROLS ARE DIFFICULT BUT SO IS DRIVING A TRACTOR ❤❤❤

🚜🚜🚜🚜🚜🚜🚜 <-- tractor unicode, but not implemented yet :(

(We actually got to drive a tractor and pick up tractor eggs. Isolation jam is the best!)
